title: Tokyo motor show 2019: star cars
text:
The 2019 Tokyo motor show has opened at the Japanese capital's Big Sight arena. There are two press and trade days, then it opens to the public from Thursday October 24 and runs until Monday November 4.

Although the Japanese show has become renowned for weird and wacky "mobility solutions" there is always a globally important new car on show – this year it was supposed to be the reveal of the all-new Honda Jazz, beloved by Honest John and Telegraph readers alike.

Lexus LF-30

LF stands for Lexus Electrified and 30 celebrates Toyota's luxury nameplate's three decades of making premium cars. And while Lexus still struggles against the German brands in Europe, in America it has cored into the underbelly...
description: The 2019 Tokyo motor show has opened at the Japanese capital's Big Sight arena.
